title: Unusual cysteine modifications in natural product biosynthesis
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,293-311
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00020J, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yaojie Gao, Yuhao Zhu, Takayoshi Awakawa, Ikuro Abe
L-Cysteine metabolism is one of the most important modifications not only in human metabolism but also in cysteine-derived natural products. This review focuses on the catalytic mechanisms of metalloenzymes involved in unusual cysteine modifications.
